thread.section_title: Pregnant Amy Childs passionately defends herself after she’s pictured drinking Prosecco – Metro
thread.title: Pregnant Amy Childs passionately defends herself after she’s pictured drinking Prosecco
thread.title_full: Pregnant Amy Childs passionately defends herself after she’s pictured drinking Prosecco

author: Amy Duncan
title: Pregnant Amy Childs passionately defends herself after she’s pictured drinking Prosecco
text:
So it seems I’ve been criticised following a set of photos which surfaced yesterday. I’m pretty hurt that people would think I am the sort of person who would put my baby at risk. Under no circumstances would I ever do that. Being a mum is something I’ve dreamt of for so long and I wouldn’t ruin it for an act of selfishness. The pictures you are all referring to have been taken way out of context. I’m a girl that loves a glass of fizz, but since finding out I was pregnant I’ve not gone near a drop of alcohol. Instead, I've found a non-alcholic version of my favourite drink (prosecco) @scavirayuk which means I can still enjoy myself and have a chat with my friends over a drink! I hope this clears it up for anyone that was doubting me. I will always put my baby first. 
A post shared by Amy Childs (@amychilds1990) on Mar 30, 2017 at 3:22am PDT 
Amy Childs has hit out at critics in a passionate Instagram post after she was pictured drinking Prosecco whilst pregnant.
Victoria Beckham is so going to be a helicopter parent when he's at Uni Photos emerged of the 26-year-old former TOWIE star holding a bottle of Prosecco in one hand and sipping from a glass of the beverage in the other hand.
It immediately spawned a stirng…
But Amy, who appeared on Loose Women today, has now defended herself over the recent photos, explaining that she was, in fact, drinking non-alcoholic Prosecco called Scavi & Ray, which is owned by Steps’ Claire Richards.declaring she is ‘hurt’ at the accusations.
‘So it seems I’ve been criticised following a set of photos which surfaced yesterday. I’m pretty hurt that people would think I am the sort of person who would put my baby at risk.
‘Under no circumstances would I ever do that. Being a mum is something I’ve dreamt of for so long and I wouldn’t ruin it for an act of selfishness.
‘The pictures you are all referring to have been taken way out of context. I’m a girl that loves a glass of fizz, but since finding out I was pregnant I’ve not gone near a drop of alcohol.
‘Instead, I’ve found a non-alcholic version of my favourite drink (prosecco) @ scavirayuk which means I can still enjoy myself and have a chat with my friends over a drink!
‘I hope this clears it up for anyone that was doubting me. I will always put my baby first. .’
 
On way to @loosewomen to talk all things baby today 
Can't wait to catch up with the girls 
— Amy Andrea Childs (@MissAmyChilds) March 30, 2017 

A post shared by Amy Childs (@amychilds1990) on Mar 29, 2017 at 1:42pm PDT 
Amy is due to welcome her baby daughter with boyfriend Bradley Wright in May.
Speaking of having a little girl, Amy told OK!: ‘I think I’m still in shock. Instinct told me it was going to be a boy. A psychic told me it as going to be a boy… I even ordered a boy Moncler baby bag because I was so convinced, but it’s a girl!
‘They told me it was a girl and I was in such shock, I said: “No, you must be wrong,” to a Harley Street doctor.’
MORE: Amy Childs fears she might not be able to breastfeed her first child because of her surgery 
MORE: Amy Childs is expecting her first baby with boyfriend Bradley Wright
